name: Time Solver
description:
You are a pilot from the year 2068, who finds changes in the timeline and traces them back to their source, in order to destroy them and set the timeline back to normal again.

In order to travel back in time, you must defeat the invading enemies while your time jump portal charges, and then leap further back in time towards the source of the anomaly.

This game is still very unfinished, as I did I did not have time to add more rooms, or build more of the story into the game.
